techmeme.title: Avataar releases Velocity, a generative AI tool that creates product videos based on a product link, says HP, Victoria's Secret, and others are using the tool (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Sam Altman says "we are now confident we know how to build AGI as we have traditionally understood it", and OpenAI is turning its focus to superintelligence (Sam Altman)
Uber and Lyft are embracing autonomous vehicle operators like Waymo, May Mobility, and others, after abandoning their own self-driving car programs (Preetika Rana/Wall Street Journal)
Sources: India plans $2.7B in fresh subsidies and import tariff cuts to boost local manufacturing, especially of smartphones made by companies like Apple (Bloomberg)
A look at the rise of Watch Duty, a wildfire alert app that is active in 14 US states and has gained up to 7.2M active users in three years since its launch (Gabrielle Canon/The Guardian)
